scripts.test-e2e: NODE_ENV=test npm run deploy & npx cypress run
scripts.test: npm run test-server & npm run test-client
scripts.start: npm run watch --prefix server & npm start --prefix client
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server
scripts.deploy: npm run build --prefix client && npm start --prefix server
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run build --prefix server && npm run build --prefix client && npm run start-prod --prefix server
